name: Shipwrecked
description: You are the sole survivor of a shipwreck that left you stranded on a remote and inhospitable island for years. Your struggle to survive there granted you insight into the natural world but distanced you from who you once were.

shipwrecked_benefit.name: Shipwrecked: Natural Insights
shipwrecked_benefit.effect: You gained two skills from the exploration skill group.

shipwrecked_drawback.name: Shipwrecked: Changed Person
shipwrecked_drawback.effect: You have forgotten one language you knew.
